name: Devil's Brand
loreDescription: As long as this brand is with you, the Devil will continue to protect you.

skillDescription.base: Increases the Effect Resistance of all allies by 2.0% at the beginning of the turn. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.
skillDescription.max: Increases the Effect Resistance of all allies by 4.0% at the beginning of the turn. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.
